name: SUSSY RUN
description:
THERES IMPOSTERS EVERYWHERE! ok, so the the point of the (endless runner) game is to not die. yes, this was made in scratch. idk how to do java code so i had to stick to block code. space to jump. thats all the controls. by the way, the red things help you.

More updates coming soon!

STORY: You're a Crewmate trying to escape the ship and a BUNCH of Imposters are getting in your way! will you be able to escape them? or will you die.

if you die just reload the page.
